statements: SELECT * FROM approved_repair_shops;
SELECT shop_name, shop_location FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_location = 'New York';
SELECT shop_name, shop_contact FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE approved_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT shop_name, shop_location, shop_contact FROM approved_repair_shops ORDER BY shop_name DESC;
SELECT shop_id, shop_name FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_location = 'New York' ORDER BY shop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE approved_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT shop_name, shop_contact FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY shop_name DESC
SELECT * FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_contact IS NOT NULL
SELECT shop_id, shop_name, shop_location FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT * FROM repair_shops;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM repair_shops WHERE shop_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT shop_name, location, contact_number FROM repair_shops ORDER BY shop_name ASC;
SELECT shop_id, shop_name, location, contact_number FROM repair_shops WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY shop_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM repair_shops;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM repair_shops ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT shop_name, claim_amount FROM repair_shops JOIN claims ON repair_shops.shop_id = claims.shop_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE shop_id = 3 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT shop_name, COUNT(claims.claim_id) AS total_claims FROM repair_shops LEFT JOIN claims ON repair_shops.shop_id = claims.shop_id GROUP BY shop_name HAVING total_claims > 5;
SELECT * FROM approved_repair_shops;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE location='New York';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM repair_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT shop_name, contact_person, location, claim_amount FROM approved_repair_shops JOIN repair_claims ON approved_repair_shops.shop_id = repair_claims.shop_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;

SELECT shop_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM approved_repair_shops JOIN repair_shop_ratings ON approved_repair_shops.shop_id = repair_shop_ratings.shop_id GROUP BY shop_name ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM approved_repair_shops;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT shop_name, claim_amount FROM approved_repair_shops JOIN repair_claims ON approved_repair_shops.shop_id = repair_claims.shop_id WHERE claim_amount > 500;
SELECT shop_name, rating, review FROM approved_repair_shops JOIN repair_shop_ratings ON approved_repair_shops.shop_id = repair_shop_ratings.shop_id;

SELECT shop_name, location, claim_date, claim_amount FROM approved_repair_shops JOIN repair_claims ON approved_repair_shops.shop_id = repair_claims.shop_id WHERE location = 'California' AND claim_amount < 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM repair_shops;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM repair_shops ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, shop_id FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_phone) > 10;
SELECT * FROM repair_shops ORDER BY shop_name DESC;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM repair_shops WHERE service_type = 'Auto';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees JOIN repair_shops ON employees.shop_id = repair_shops.shop_id WHERE repair_shops.location LIKE '%City';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM repair_shop;
SELECT shop_name, shop_address, shop_city FROM repair_shop;
SELECT shop_name, shop_state FROM repair_shop WHERE shop_city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM repair_shop WHERE shop_city = 'New York' ORDER BY shop_name DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, repair_date FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT approval_id, claim_id, approval_date FROM claim_approval WHERE status_id = 2 ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT status_name FROM claim_status WHERE status_name LIKE 'Pending%' ORDER BY status_id ASC;
